landing.title: Welcome to Aily
landing.subtitle: Your Personal AI Learning Assistant
landing.description: Learn programming concepts interactively with Aily, an intelligent assistant that adapts to your learning style.
landing.feature1Desc: Aily learns your preferred way of learning and adapts accordingly
landing.feature2Desc: Start from basics and advance to complex concepts at your own pace
landing.feature3Desc: Aily remembers everything you've learned and builds upon it
landing.feature4Desc: Engage in meaningful conversations with Aily about programming
landing.ailyDescription1: Aily is your personal AI learner designed to help teachers through interactive learning sessions. Unlike traditional chatbots, Aily is a genuine learner that retains knowledge from every teaching session you have.
landing.ailyDescription2: Every time you start a new session, Aily adopts a different learning personality. But what makes Aily special is that she never forgets. All concepts learned accumulate over time.
landing.benefit1: Deepen your understanding by explaining concepts
landing.benefit2: Observe how Aily learns and adapts
landing.benefit3: Build on previous knowledge - Aily remembers everything
landing.step1Desc: Select any JavaScript topic you want to learn
landing.step2Desc: Begin an interactive conversation with Aily
landing.step3Desc: Monitor your learning and Aily's knowledge growth
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of users who are learning by teaching

curiousExplorer.name: Curious Explorer
curiousExplorer.description: Asks many questions and needs detailed examples. Takes time but thoroughly understands concepts.

quickLearner.name: Quick Learner
quickLearner.description: Fast, independent learner who prefers brief explanations and hands-on practice.

logicalThinker.name: Logical Thinker
logicalThinker.description: Highly curious analyst who wants deep understanding. Loves logic and exploring edge cases.

practicalHelper.name: Practical Helper
practicalHelper.description: Grounded learner focused on real-world applications and helping others.

organizedLearner.name: Organized Learner
organizedLearner.description: Values clear rules and logical progression. Learns well with systematic approach.

creativeBuilder.name: Creative Builder
creativeBuilder.description: Project-oriented learner who thrives on building things with visible results.
